rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究表明低脂牛奶可能增加糖尿病前期风险，高脂酸奶则降低风险《美国临床营养学杂志》的研究发现乳制品摄入量与糖尿病前期风险之间存在关联，强调低脂牛奶消费可能会增加糖尿病前期风险，而高脂酸奶则可降低风险，尤其是在受过高等教育的人群中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231210/Study-shows-low-fat-milk-may-increase-prediabetes-risk-high-fat-yogurt-lowers-it.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231210/Study-shows-low-fat-milk-may-increase-prediabetes-risk-high-fat-yogurt-lowers-it.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dcd1f4d4-43f2-4904-9056-e92469e32bca Sun, 10 Dec 2023 23:15:00 -0500 Study shows low-fat milk may increase prediabetes risk, high-fat yogurt lowers it
ChatGPT 模型在神经学考试中表现出色，超越了人类学生的表现研究表明，两个 ChatGPT 大语言模型 (LLM) 在入学考试中的表现优于人类神经学学生，其中一个模型的准确率达到 85%，展示了它们在临床神经学和医学教育方面的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231210/ChatGPT-models-excel-in-neurology-exam-surpassing- human-student-performance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231210/ChatGPT-models-excel-in-neurology-exam-surpassing- human-student-performance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=77cadc1c-7a2b-49a2-91b6-d991e15db51c Sun, 10 Dec 2023 23:00:00 -0500 ChatGPT models excel in neurology exam, surpassing human student performance
机器学习揭示了健康老龄化的关键标志，与慢性疾病风险分开研究人员利用机器学习，通过分析不同年龄段的健康数据，找到中性粒细胞计数和碱性磷酸酶水平等关键标志物作为健康衰老的早期指标，成功区分了健康衰老的因素和慢性疾病风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231210/Machine-learning-reveals-key-markers-for-healthy-aging-separate-from-chronic-disease-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231210/Machine-learning-reveals-key-markers-for-healthy-aging-separate-from-chronic-disease-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=30e22882-d928-4dff-9c1a-66bcbd372dd4 Sun, 10 Dec 2023 22:31:00 -0500 Machine learning reveals key markers for healthy aging, separate from chronic disease risks
研究发现天然补充剂 Guayusa 茶和狮鬃菇可提高认知能力研究表明，瓜尤萨提取物和北欧狮鬃毛 (LM) 可以改善主观认知感知和客观认知表现，凸显它们在增强认知功能和情绪方面的潜在益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231210/Natural-supplements-Guayusa-tea-and-Lione28099s-Mane-boost-cognitive-performance-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231210/Natural-supplements-Guayusa-tea-and-Lione28099s-Mane-boost-cognitive-performance-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e728658b-afe1-4356-977f-7ba259cf5d3d Sun, 10 Dec 2023 22:06:00 -0500 Natural supplements Guayusa tea and Lion’s Mane boost cognitive performance, study finds
成人和儿童细菌性脑膜炎的各种早期症状凸显了诊断挑战《科学报告》中的这项研究表明，社区获得性细菌性脑膜炎 (CABM) 的症状在儿童和成人之间存在差异，强调需要在早期诊断和治疗中采取量身定制的方法以改善结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231210/Varied-early-symptoms-of-bacterial-meningitis-in-adults-and-children-highlight-diagnostic-challenges.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231210/Varied-early-symptoms-of-bacterial-meningitis-in-adults-and-children-highlight-diagnostic-challenges.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0f75c1ea-19c3-49aa-9f6a-607d781528c9 Sun, 10 Dec 2023 21:52:00 -0500 Varied early symptoms of bacterial meningitis in adults and children highlight diagnostic challenges
全球研究显示高血压在中年夫妇中很常见研究报告称，英国、美国、印度和中国的中年异性夫妇中一致高血压的患病率很高，这表明以夫妇为中心的干预措施可能对高血压管理有效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231210/Global-study-reveals-hypertension-common-among-middle-ged- Couples.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231210/Global-study-reveals-hypertension-common-among-middle-ged- Couples.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0ed71d5d-d851-4a91-9df2-2e7a4fc2e5ae Sun, 10 Dec 2023 20:44:00 -0500 Global study reveals hypertension common among middle-aged couples
胰腺癌治疗的突破：抑制特定酶可减缓肿瘤进展研究表明，抑制基质 I 类组蛋白脱乙酰酶 (HDAC) 可以有效减缓胰腺癌的进展，为针对肿瘤微环境的新治疗方法提供了线索。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231210/Breakthrough-in-pancreatic-cancer-treatment-Inhibiting-specific-enzymes-slows-tumor-progression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231210/Breakthrough-in-pancreatic-cancer-treatment-Inhibiting-specific-enzymes-slows-tumor-progression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0fe5ea50-e632-4904-acfc-744c3d52f826 Sun, 10 Dec 2023 20:37:00 -0500 Breakthrough in pancreatic cancer treatment: Inhibiting specific enzymes slows tumor progression
揭示离子和水流入在 T 细胞迁移中的关键作用研究表明，T 细胞迁移依赖于离子和水的流入来进行肌动蛋白聚合和运动，而 WNK1 激酶在调节这些过程中发挥着关键作用，为适应性免疫提供了新的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231210/Key-role-of-ion-and-water-influx-in-T-cell-migration-uncovered.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231210/Key-role-of-ion-and-water-influx-in-T-cell-migration-uncovered.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=477da14f-7d98-4717-8662-4e8a3241752f Sun, 10 Dec 2023 20:16:00 -0500 Key role of ion and water influx in T cell migration uncovered
研究评估了年轻人早期负面生活事件、眶额皮质厚度和抑郁症之间的联系研究发现，早期的负面生活事件可以预测成年早期的抑郁症状，但并不是通过整个青春期的眶额皮层（OFC）加速变薄来预测的，这挑战了之前关于大脑结构变化和心理健康的假设。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231210/Study-asseses-links- Between-early-negative-life-events-orbitofrontal-cortical-thickness-and-depression-in-young-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231210/Study-asseses-links- Between-early-male-life-events-orbitofrontal-cortical-thickness-and-depression-in-young-adults.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=408e79c9-ba8e-41b0-aff1-fe838cfa5fc7 Sun, 10 Dec 2023 19:28:00 -0500 Study assesses links between early negative life events, orbitofrontal cortical thickness and depression in young adults
研究将空气污染与早产和低出生体重风险增加联系起来研究强调了减少怀孕期间空气污染暴露对于预防早产和低出生体重等风险的重要性，表明空气质量与孕产妇和新生儿健康结果之间存在很强的相关性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231210/Study-links-air-pollution-to-increased-risks-of-preterm-birth-and-low-birth-weight.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231210/Study-links-air-pollution-to-increased-risks-of-preterm-birth-and-low-birth-weight.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=47d015f5-60d1-47bc-908f-0ee39c9eb2c0 Sun, 10 Dec 2023 18:41:00 -0500 Study links air pollution to increased risks of preterm birth and low birth weight
